trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Nacogdoches
There were no other sightings in Nacogdoches on or around January 18th 2009
Summary: Bright yellow orange cigar shape, controlled speed and altitude.
divs: sighting detailsi looked up from my back patio enjoying the weather and i saw from north to south what looked like a straight line of lights with no spaces in between about 2 inches in horizon length fly straight across the sky with complete controlled speed and altitude. it left a minor blur of lights in its wake which faded quickly. i have seen many planes, meteors, and meteorites in my life and this looked like nothing i have ever encountered. i had time to call over a guy sitting on his back patio to look as well and he agreed it was def not a plane. the whole thing lasted what seemed like maybe 1-1 1\2 minutes.
